actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of Federal financial assistance for research programs and specialized treatment centers for the study and treatment of problems respecting human fertility and sterility and the human reproductive process.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act by adding Title XIV - Fertility, Sterility, and the Reproductive Process. Requires the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to, and enter into contracts with, public or nonprofit entities for research projects in fertility and sterility in humans and the human reproductive process and for training to enable persons to undertake such research. Authorizes the Secretary to establish in the National Institutes of Health and in various geographical regions of the United States specialized treatment centers in the field of human reproduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of Federal financial assistance for research programs and specialized treatment centers for the study and treatment of problems respecting human fertility and sterility and the human reproductive process.
